# mra

),

),
missing = TRUE,

noSpaces = TRUE,

)

# loop
tab1loop <- print(CreateTableOne(
  vars = tabvars,
  data = rsdata %>% filter(shf_ef_cat == "HFrEF" & ddr_loopdiuretic_prior == "No"),
  strata = "shf_location"
),
missing = TRUE,
printToggle = FALSE,
nonnormal = tabvars,
catDigits = 1,
contDigits = 1,
noSpaces = TRUE,
explain = FALSE
)
tab1loop <- as_tibble(cbind(var = rownames(tab1loop), tab1loop)) %>%
  select(var, Missing, `In-patient`, `Out-patient`, p)

tab1 <- Reduce(
  function(...) {
    full_join(...,
      by = "var"
    )
  },
  list(tab1mra, tab1rasi, tab1bbl, tab1loop)
)

tab1 <- tab1 %>%
  # remove = Yes
  mutate(across(everything(), str_replace_all, fixed(" = Yes"), "")) %>%
  # to get labs and units in place
  mutate(
    var_tmp = str_split(var, " = ", simplify = TRUE)[, 1],
    val_tmp = str_split(var, " = ", simplify = TRUE)[, 2],
    # if recoding or categorizing will still get org label
    var_tmp2 = str_replace_all(var_tmp, "(_cat2|_cat)", ""),
    # if shf/sos combination  will still get org label
    var_tmp2 = str_replace_all(var_tmp2, "shf_sos_com_", "sos_com_"),
  )

tab1 <- left_join(tab1,
  meta.variables.Sheet.1 %>%
    select(variable, label, unit),
  by = c("var_tmp2" = "variable")
) %>%
  mutate(
    Variable = coalesce(label, var_tmp),
    Variable = if_else(!is.na(unit),
      paste0(Variable, " (", unit, ")"),
      Variable
    ),
    Variable = if_else(val_tmp != "",
      paste0(Variable, " ", val_tmp),
      Variable
    )
  )


write.xlsx(tab1 %>% select(Variable, Missing.x:p.y.y), paste0("./output/tabs/tab1_rEF_", Sys.Date(), ".xlsx"), rowNames = FALSE)

# footnotes
tab1 <- tab1 %>%
  mutate(
    footnote1 = if_else(str_detect(var, "^shf_"), footnote_marker_symbol(1), ""),
    footnote2 = if_else(str_detect(var, "sos_"), footnote_marker_symbol(2), ""),
    footnote3 = if_else(str_detect(var, "^scb_"), footnote_marker_symbol(3), ""),
    footnote4 = if_else(str_detect(var, "^scb_dispincome_cat"), footnote_marker_symbol(4), ""), 
    footnote5 = if_else(var %in% impvars, footnote_marker_symbol(5), ""),
    footnote6 = if_else(var %in% modvars, footnote_marker_symbol(6), "")
  ) %>%
  unite(footnote, starts_with("footnote"), sep = "") %>%
  mutate(
    # so no probs
    Variable = sanitize_text(Variable),

    Variable = paste0(Variable, footnote),

    # space in Latex output (fix this other way?)
    Variable = sub("  ", ". ", Variable)
  ) %>%
  select(Variable, Missing.x:p.y.y)

## fix in order to use escape = TRUE
colnames(tab1) <- sanitize_text(c("Variable", rep(c("Missing (%)", "In-patient", "Out-patient", "p-value"), 4)))

footnote(
  default_kable(tab1,
    font_size = 2,
    caption = "Baseline characteristics - HFrEF",
    longtable = TRUE,
    escape = FALSE
  ) %>%
    landscape() %>%
    add_header_above(c(" " = 1, "Prior MRA use" = 4, " Prior RASi use" = 4, "Prior Betablocker use" = 4, "No prior Loopdiuretic use" = 4)),
  general = c(
    "Categorical variables are presented with n (%) and tested with chi-square test and continuous variables with median [q1-q3] and tested with Kruskal-Wallis test."
  ),
  symbol = c(
    "Source: SwedeHF",
    "Source: NPR",
    "Source: SCB",
    "Medium within index year",
    "Included in multiple imputation model together with prior mra, rasi, bbl and loopd",
    "Adjusted for in logistic/cox regression models"
  )
)
